Class CompanyRepController

java.lang.Object
controllers.CompanyRepController
public class CompanyRepController extends Object
Controller responsible for handling all business logic related to Company Representatives.

This controller allows Company Reps to:

  • View internship opportunities they created
  • Filter opportunities by status
  • Create new internship opportunities
  • Access student information for applications
  • Persist updated internship and user data

It serves as the logic layer between the CompanyRepView and the underlying repositories.

  • Method Details

    • getRelevantInternshipOpportunities

      public ArrayList<InternshipOpportunity> getRelevantInternshipOpportunities(String userID)
      Retrieves all internship opportunities created by a specific Company Representative.
      Parameters:
      userID - ID of the Company Representative
      Returns:
      list of relevant InternshipOpportunity

    • getInternshipByStatus

      public ArrayList<InternshipOpportunity> getInternshipByStatus(String userID, InternshipOpportunity.Status status)
      Retrieves internship opportunities created by the Company Rep that match a specific status.
      Parameters:
      userID - ID of the Company Representative
      status - opportunity status to filter by
      Returns:
      list of InternshipOpportunity with the given status

    • getNoOfApplications

      public ArrayList<InternshipOpportunity> getNoOfApplications(String userID)
      Retrieves opportunities created by the Company Rep. (Method name suggests count, but currently returns the full list.)
      Parameters:
      userID - ID of the Company Representative
      Returns:
      list of InternshipOpportunity

    • getInternshipOpportunityList

      Retrieves all internship opportunities in the system.
      Returns:
      list of all InternshipOpportunity

    • addInternshipOpportunity

      public void addInternshipOpportunity(InternshipOpportunity internshipOpportunity)
      Adds a new internship opportunity created by the Company Rep.
      Parameters:
      internshipOpportunity - the opportunity to add

    • saveFiles

      public void saveFiles()
      Saves updated internship opportunities and company representative data to persistent storage.

      This method should be called when the Company Rep logs out or after major modifications.

    • findStudentByUserID

      public Student findStudentByUserID(String userID)
      Finds a student by user ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the student
      Returns:
      the matching Student, or null if not found

    • filterOpportunities

      public ArrayList<InternshipOpportunity> filterOpportunities(Filter filter)
      Filters internship opportunities based on the given filter criteria.
      Parameters:
      filter - the filter conditions (status, level, major, dates, etc.)
      Returns:
      list of filtered InternshipOpportunity
